title: Merch?????
body:
Hey,
I went to track my kindred plushie from order number 16500015713  and I got this error here. I was wondering if I should be worried or not.
Thanks in advance [](https://gyazo.com/99e714041d3f2652021c5b9ab327eb06)

NOTE: I realise that the link should be put in the link box but it wouldn't load :(

replies.body:
You can paste the link just as text in the main body as well. It can take a day or two for tracking on a package to be available, so if you ordering in the last 48 hours I wouldn't be worried. If it's been longer than that I still wouldn't get too worried, but you can submit a ticket to player support and they should be able to help you.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Bro its nearly been a month. I submitted a ticket to riot support about 2 weeks ago and still haven't heard back. I'm wondering if it was a waste of 25usd.
Edit: I was told the order had been shipped on April the 6th and it is now May the 3rd.

In my experience with the merch shop it does take a long time for stuff to arrive to OCE, but I would recommend submitting a second ticket. They pretty much always respond within 2 days, so I'm not sure why you didn't get as response unless you kept bumping the ticket (replying to it before receiving a response bumps it back down the queue).

It got here two days later. Also I didn't ever bump the ticket. In my experience, they usually never or take a really long time to reply. Still haven't been replied to on that ticket. Thanks for your help though I appreciate it. ^w^

I can't say I've ever had a ticket go unanswered, it's certainly strange. Can you see the ticket if you login to the support site?

At any rate, glad you got your merch :)
